title: From Relational Databases to Belief Networks
abstract: The relationship between belief networks and relational databases is examined. Based on this analysis, a method to construct belief networks automatically from statistical relational data is proposed. A comparison between our method and other methods shows that our method has several advantages when generalization or prediction is deeded.
histories: Appears in Proceedings of the Seventh Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI1991)
